name: BreastCancerBiopsyAndSurgicalExcision
title: Breast Cancer Biopsy and Surgical Excision
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to consolidate the codes relevant to core needle biopsy, fine needle aspiration, and surgical excision from across different quality programs.),(Data Element Scope: Breast Cancer Biopsy),(Inclusion Criteria: Breast Cancer Biopsy),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)

concept.display: Puncture aspiration of cyst of breast
Puncture aspiration of cyst of breast; each additional cyst (List separately in addition to code for primary procedure)
